Package ohos.agp.components

Class AttrHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.AttrHelper

  • public class AttrHelper
extends Object
    Converts the type of attribute values from character string to integer or Boolean.
    Since:
    3

      Default constructor used to create a AttrHelper instance.

      • convertValueToInt

        public static int convertValueToInt​(String value,
                                    int defaultValue)
        Converts a value from a character string to an integer.

        If the value is empty, the value specified by defaultValue is returned.

        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the value to convert.
        defaultValue - Indicates the default value.
        Returns:
        Returns the integer value after conversion.

      • convertValueToBoolean

        public static boolean convertValueToBoolean​(String value,
                                            boolean defaultValue)
        Converts a value from a character string to a Boolean value.

        Ensure that the Boolean value is either true or false. Otherwise, an exception will occur.

        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the value to convert.
        defaultValue - Indicates the default value.
        Returns:
        Returns the Boolean value after conversion.

      • convertValueToFloat

        public static float convertValueToFloat​(String value,
                                        float defaultValue)
        Converts a character string to a floating point value. If the character string does not exist, the value specified by defaultValue is returned.
        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the character string to convert.
        defaultValue - Indicates the default value.
        Returns:
        Returns the floating point value after conversion.
